description: Mental health disorders are conditions that affect a person"s thinking, feeling, mood, or behavior. relation: Cardiovascular Disease --[Linked To]-> Mental Health Disorders--description:Chronic sleep deprivation has been linked to an increased risk of mental health disorders, which can indirectly contribute to the development of cardiovascular disease.-- relation: Cardiovascular Disease --[Linked To]-> Chronic Sleep Deprivation--description:Chronic sleep deprivation has been linked to an increased risk of cardiovascular disease.-- relation: sleep disorders --[Can Lead To]-> Chronic Sleep Deprivation--description:Sleep disorders can lead to chronic sleep deprivation.-- relation: sleep disorders --[Increases Risk Of]-> Diabetes--description:Chronic sleep deprivation, often resulting from sleep disorders, can increase the risk of diabetes.-- relation: sleep disorders --[Increases Risk Of]-> Obesity--description:Chronic sleep deprivation, often resulting from sleep disorders, can increase the risk of obesity.--

description: The N2 stage is the second of four stages in non-rapid eye movement (NREM) sleep. It is characterized by a decrease in body temperature and heart rate, as well as the onset of sleep spindles and K-complexes.
